body_content.explanation: If you are skimpily dressed, your clothing shows a lot of your body:
examples: The use of skimpily dressed women in advertising stereotypes women.
Inside the hall, there are several groups of skimpily clad dancers.
They were both dressed skimpily in shorts and T-shirts.

body_content.explanation: in a way that is not enough or not large enough:
examples: They cut material so skimpily that many women have to go up a size to find anything that fits.
The room itself was skimpily furnished.
